item.description:
The film starts at 7. I will be at the theater by 6PM and I want the group to head in by 6:30 at the latest. This is will probably sell out so buy ahead.....they are available on Fandango right now.

I will be upstairs near the big windows if the movie is showing upstairs and if it is downstairs I will be just inside the ropes near the concession stand.

If you should miss us before the movie, we will be gathering right outside the auditorium after the movie to discuss and decide where to go for refreshments.


The movie is :

X-Men Origins: Wolverine

Starring: Hugh Jackman, Liev Schreiber, Ryan Reynolds, Taylor Kitsch, Will.i.am, Danny Huston, Dominic Monaghan, Daniel Henney, Lynn Collins

Official Website:

http://www.x-menorigi...


Plot Summary: Leading up to the events of "X-Men," "X-Men Origins: Wolverine" tells the story of Wolverine's epically violent and romantic past, his complex relationship with Victor Creed, and the ominous Weapon X program. Along the way, Wolverine encounters many mutants, both familiar and new, including surprise appearances by several legends of the X-Men universe.
item.how_to_find_us: I will be wearing a Boston Movie Group Badge.
item.name: XMEN Origins: Wolverine
